metadata.title: Implement Retry for Failed Batch Executions

story.iWant: to retry only failed executions from a batch

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Given** batch execution completed with some failures 2. When** I run `rgrid retry --batch --failed-only` 3. Then** CLI retries only executions with status = failed 4. And** successful executions are skipped 5. And** retried executions get new execution IDs
